humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor as 1.7 x 1.6 x 1.2 cm. According to the rules provided, T1 tumors are 2 cm or less in size. Since the largest tumor size in this report is 1.7 cm, the T stage is T1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the patient has infiltrating ductal carcinoma, which forms a 1.7 x 1.6 x 1.2 cm mass. According to the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) staging system for breast cancer, T2 stage applies to tumors that are greater than 2 cm in size but not greater than 5 cm. In this case, the tumor size is 1.7 cm, which falls within the T2 range.
